message.name: ERR_XRV_FROM_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_REGISTRATION_DATE_OF_PROVIDER_ORGANIZATION
message.locale: The From date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrollment Date of the provider, %2d.
The From date, %1d, must be on or after the Enrolment Date of the provider, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERPARTICIPANT_XRV_PARTICIPANT_WITH_DATE_OF_DEATH
message.locale: %1s is deceased with a date of death of %2d and cannot be a %3c %4c.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERPARTY_XRV_ACTIVE_PROVIDERMEMBERSHIP_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Already an active provider membership exist between %1s and %2s.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERPARTY_XRV_ACTIVE_PROVIDERMEMBER_FOR_PERIOD_CANNOT_BE_UNASSIGNED
message.locale: %1s is a provider member from %2d to %3d, the person cannot be marked as unassigned.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERPARTY_XRV_ACTIVE_PROVIDERMEMBER_CANNOT_BE_UNASSIGNED
message.locale: %1s is a provider member from %2d, the person cannot be marked as unassigned.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERPARTY_XRV_UNASSIGNED_ACTIVE_PROVIDERMEMBER_FOR_PERIOD_EXISTS
message.locale: %1s is already an unassigned provider member from %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDERPARTY_XRV_UNASSIGNED_ACTIVE_PROVIDERMEMBER_EXISTS
message.locale: %1s is already an unassigned provider member from %2d.
